Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Judge and the New York Yankees will see Miles Mikolas starting for the St. Louis Cardinals in the final game of a three-game series, Sunday at 1:35 p.m. ET.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees have a 3.76 team ERA that ranks sixth among all MLB pitching staffs.
Cardinals pitchers have a combined ERA of 4.16 ERA this year, which ranks 18th in MLB.
The game is scheduled to start at 1:35 p.m. ET.
Others: The game will be held at Yankee Stadium in The Bronx, New York.
The live stream is available on Fubo.
